page.title: 19LORRIES IN AN OLD TOWN
page.content: Lorries pass through the roads of{Usk many times a day.Recently a campiagn} has been set up to stop lorries coming through{Usk.}The main hauliers are{ICI}whose lorries pass through all of the time with big loads. We did a survey on shopping in{Usk}and the lorries caused us a lot of trouble as when they passed the noise was deafening so we had to shout to make ourselves heard. The {town council}have carried out a test to show that it wouldn't cost much to ban large lorries from {Usk. { }They hope that the temporary ban that once existed will soon be reinstated and so improve the{safety {of people in Usk.}
